body.p:
Fulton Co Ky Jan 11th 1864
Col G. C. Hallet
Hickman Ky.
Dr Sir

Your note together with Govn's commission is to hand. In order that you may not be retarded in the organization of your regiment I deem it my duty to inform you at once, that having been elected without my knowledge or consent to the position the duties of which I am wholy unqualified to perform' I have written a note to the Govenor declining the appointment.
